title: 遇到一篇不錯的英文作文題目

content.author: 沒台大法_誓不為人
content.body:
把可可蘿說的話寫進去了
看不懂沒關係
做個記錄而已 

 The gap year

If I had a light-hearted gap year, I would like to do something significant and profound. For instance, I hope that I can be the volunteer of Legal Aid Foundation, which is an organization that helps the individual to tackle the twist of law for free of charge, and the reasons are listed below. To begin with, It is worth mentioning that the law plays a predominant role in modern society, and no individual can live without that. Furthermore, there are innumerable individuals who have urgent requirements of legal assistances, Take child abuse for example, they always have no capability to get rid of abusive mistreatments, and all I have to do is help them devotedly and determinedly. Last but not least, the service lets me cultivate the virtue of aiding others, on account of most of the individuals are too indifferent and nonchalant to help others. Based on the aforementioned reasons, I am firmly convinced that being the volunteer of LAF is what I am eager for accomplishing the most in the gap year.

I have weighed the advantages deliberately of being the volunteer of LAF. First and foremost, I am extremely longing for studying in department of law, hence, I can acquire considerable knowledge and realize what I am bound to do in my colorful future during the time. Moreover, I can learn precious experiences via the conversations of aiding individuals, for every individual is identical to a limited-edition almanac, which chronicles every hard-earned lesson.Finally,as the saying goes, “ When you learn, teach;when you get,give. ” I have received plenty of assistances since I was born; likewise, l am meant to devote myself to helping those who are in severe predicaments, hence, I think of being the volunteer of LAF as a superb choice in the gap year.

浪費我好多時間寫喔==

content.author: 沒台大法_誓不為人

可可蘿的頭號大粉絲

content.author: 可可蘿的頭號大粉絲
content.body:
沒台大法_誓不為人
我英文本來就爛

大部分都是學德文
畢竟德國法學重鎮
民事類會留美 英美法

簡單來說就是大學時期用不到
研究所、博士就會被幹到飛了

content.author: 沒台大法_誓不為人
content.body:
可可蘿的頭號大粉絲
我以為法學重鎮是法國欸
畢竟法文是世界上數一數二複雜的語言
所有戰爭條約都以法文版本為準的說

content.author: 可可蘿的頭號大粉絲
content.body:
沒台大法_誓不為人
並不是

是德國
我們的法幾乎都是德國來的
德國慕尼黑、海德堡大學有很多世界知名的學者

台灣第一批出國留學學法的公費生也是去德國
我們法律的雛形是他們弄得

德國是思想類學術的重鎮
有個很厲害的人叫roxin
他的刑法見解全世界通用

content.author: 可可蘿的頭號大粉絲
content.body:
沒台大法_誓不為人
大部分出國留學都是留德
不管是公法領域、民事領域或刑事領域
德國見解都是主流學派
號稱歐陸法系最好的成文法不是開玩笑的

而且德國研究所學費全免

再來刑事類的會留日

民事類留美很多
尤其是智財、著作權那種的

content.author: 沒台大法_誓不為人
content.body:
可可蘿的頭號大粉絲
那你484要留美
牛逼可可蘿!!!
